100190:

i.
im a fool like that.
i didn't see you and.
i ALWAYS promise myself.
even if i try again.
and even though those sweet words tempt me, I dont get deceived.
and even if you phone, i dont pick up.
and even if I promise myself, i hear the phone ring again so soon...

(baby these days im going well, in that time i was soo busy, i didn't call)
words didnt come.
why phone if i cant even get through?
(baby im really sorry, but you know my heart, now ill do well)
where...!
if its like this...
this thing that didn't come about.
while i know.
...
